body.p:
State of Illinois
Sangamon County } SS.

Isaac. J. Ketcham being first duly sworne according to law upon oath says, that he is a resident of the County of Morgan and said State of Illinois. That the said Robert Pullum mentioned in the complaint and writ hereto attached is a fugitive from justice.

Affiant further says that he has good reason to believe that said Robert Pullum is in the State of Kentucky, for the purpose of evading -- and escaping, just punishment for the crime of murder, committed in the said county of Morgan and state of Illinois as alledged in the complaint of R R Smith hereto attached,
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 30th day of July 1864.

S. S. Whitehurst clerk
Sangamon County Circuit Court

Hon. O. M. Hatch
Sec. of State

Please issue writ of requisition for return of Robert Pulliam upon mentioned in within Affidavit
July 29th 1864
